root: ^F*ck! How many of those wankers do we need to beat?
^They just keep on coming! We need to flee!
^We can't just leave, they'll follow us.
^No worries, I'll web them and then we run for the train station!
^After a long moment of running, the girls finally can relax.
^That was close! Claire are you okay you almost fell over?
^I should be fine... Willow and Makra are you two in good shape?
^Yeah Willow, you're not used to running like that.
^I'm okay! I... just need... a minute... f*ck!
^I am doing fine as well... We should hide a prepare ourselves for the next part of the plan.
^Yeah we have everything to make the bomb... as long as we put it at the right place, nobody will get hurt.
^I shall make us a fire to stay warm.
